basics.name: Julien De Muynke
basics.label: Audio Scientist & Music Enthusiast
basics.summary: I am a signal processing researcher in the field of binaural and 3D audio, and passionate about music and audio technologies in general.

education.Project: Design of a real time acoustic feedback canceller for a live audio installation

education.area: Real time, Signal processing and Digital communications

work.summary: In charge of the binaural rendering of our 3D audio engine
highlights: Design of algorithms for processing the 3D audio content and rendering it over headphones and loudspeaker installations
Acoustic measurements of type BRIRs, HRIRs, ambisonic IRs

work.summary: In charge of the audio performance of the products of the company
highlights: Design of real time algorithms aiming to enhance the audio quality of audio products of the company: headphones, home loudspeaker, stereo boombox, car radio
Conception of the acoustics of the audio products, jointly with an external audio consultant and the internal Product Design team

work.summary: Acoustic and audio signal processing engineer
highlights: Coordination of a small team of audio developers from IRCAM and freelance video game designers
Prototyping of a music video game controlled by a MIDI instrument with inertial sensors, based on Unity and Max/MSP

publications.name: Binaural sound for audio guides: an enhanced visitor’s experience in museums and archaeological sites
publications.summary: To be presented at the 2020 Annual Congress of European Association of Archaeologists

publications.name: Distance-coded Ambisonics Formats and their Reproduction on Headphones and Loudspeaker Arrays
publications.summary: Supervision of a student's Master's project from IEM, Graz, Austria

publications.name: Ambisonics DRIR as a new convention of the Spatially Oriented Format for Acoustics
publications.summary: eBrief presented at the 144th AES Convention 2018, Milan, italy

publications.name: Tools for the production of spatial audio within BINCI
Ambisonic Room Impulse Responses Database
publications.summary: Publication of a database of Ambisonics Room Impulse Responses measured in the scope of BINCI project, in SOFA format

publications.name: Integral active speaker system which can be configured to be used alone or in pairs, with enhancement of the stereo image
Method and a system for reconstituting low frequencies in audio signal
